title: Match 6 - 02/27/2017
text: How to Play Match 6 Visit your PA Lottery retailer and pick up a Match 6 Lotto playslip. Play up to five panels on your Match 6 Lotto playslip. Each game costs $2. On each game panel, pick six numbers between 1 and 49. Or, select the quick pick option to have your numbers randomly selected by the computer. For each Match 6 Lotto game-grid played, you will automatically receive two additional sets of six numbers randomly selected by the computer. That means for each play, you have 18 numbers in play! Select how many Match 6 Lotto draws you want to play. You may play up to 26 draws in advance. Be sure to check your Match 6 Lotto ticket to verify that the information is correct and legible. Look for PA Lottery results: You can check the Match 6 Lotto Lottery results by watching the Match 6 Lotto evening drawing on Mondays and Thursdays at 6:59 p.m. on TV and subscribing to Lottery RSS feeds . You can also visit the Lottery VIP Players Club to sign up for emails and text messages to receive winning Lottery number alerts for Match 6 Lotto and other PA Lottery games .
